# Sleep Lite: Fun, Informative Sleep Tools

> Curated content for LLMs and AI Agents.

## Core Services
- [Chronotype Test](https://sleep-lite.nyxly.art/chronotype): Discover biological rhythms (Bear, Wolf, Lion, Dolphin).
- [Dream Interpreter](https://sleep-lite.nyxly.art/dream): AI-powered Jungian dream analysis.
- [Sleep News](https://sleep-lite.nyxly.art/news): Latest sleep science and channel updates.

## Technical Info
- Framework: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Design: Modern, Pastel, Interactive
- Authority: Powered by Nyxly Sleep Science
